question:
Which of the following was the outcome of Cop-10 held at Nagoya?
1) Protocol on Genetic Resources
2) Aichi Targets for biodiversity
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The tenth meeting of the Conference of the Parties (COP 10) to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) was held from 18th to 29th October 2010, in Nagoya, Japan. COP-10 gave birth to two things:
1) Nagoya Protocol on Genetic Resources
2) Aichi Targets for biodiversity
